adjective.description: Relating to visual art, especially involving drawing, engraving, or lettering.
Giving a vivid picture with explicit detail.
examples: he gave a graphic description of the torture

adjective.description: Of or in the form of a graph.
Of or denoting rocks having a surface texture resembling cuneiform writing.

noun.description: A graphical item displayed on a screen or stored as data.

origin: Mid 17th century: via Latin from Greek graphikos, from graphē writing, drawing.
